text: On or before March 1 of each year, the Central Collection Unit shall issue a report to the Mayor and the Council that includes:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-168, see notes under ยง 1-350.01.

DC CODE ยง 1-350.11

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The amount of delinquent debt collected in the preceding fiscal year;
The amount of uncollected delinquent debt owed to the District; and
A summary of the efforts made to collect delinquent debt owed to the District and the challenges that remain for collecting it.
